version_description:
1) New Recovery section containing Local Assistance Centers, resources, and the Red Guide to Recovery
2) Share Emergency Plan/Kit - E-mail your plan and kit contents including expiration dates to family and friends which they can import into their app.*
3) Import Emergency Plan/Kit information from friends, family or other devices.*
4) Backup and Restore* Emergency Plan/Kit from iCloud
5) Receive local notifications when items in your Emergency Plan/Kit are expired.
6) New Settings section

*Importing or Restoring an Emergency Plan/Kit will overwrite any existing Plan/Kit information stored in the app.

Added Spanish language option, accessibility features, font size adjustment, American Sign Language and audible Disaster Info Updates.
